column6: A temple in Laos protected by 100 Archers. A thirty-year-old secret uncovered. A multi-billion dollar payday revealed. The fate of modern civilization as we know it depends on Clint Barton. Pray for us.,2004,332 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$2.99
column8: | writer:Fabian Nicieza | penciller (cover):Carlos Pacheco | penciller:Stefano Raffaele
